text: Ne balia barusinjia omwandu kwabu khulwokhukoonya obuchami bwa Nyasaye nende okhuhelesia emioyo chiabu amaani bali shinga omukunda kuli hekulu, mana ifula yolucheka nikwamwo, mana nikurusia ebiamo biakwo nibimeteshe. Nekata nikulolelwa nende olucheka tawe ifula inditisa ikunyililila. Ne Nyasaye alolanga kamukholanga
